Highrise - Durham, North Carolina | Mobile Developer | ONSITE | Full-time | Relocation to Durham | jobs@high.rs | Highrise connects the world through real-time games

Highrise (http://www.joinhighrise.com/) is the leading avatar-based social app on iOS. We're backed by YC and the founders of Candy Crush. Every day, over 100,000 people use our application to make friends, keep in touch, decorate avatars and rooms, and chat. We're building a new application that builds upon our deep knowledge of avatars and games.

As Mobile Developer, you'll work closely with our CTO and Lead Mobile Engineer to build our new application. Our CTO built Highrise from the ground up, and our Lead Mobile Developer was VP Eng at Ticketmaster Mobile, where he built dozens of mobile apps. You'll work with them to develop a unique 3-layered mobile infrastructure - C++ business logic layer, Cocos2dX game engine layer, and native (Obj-C/Swift and Java/Kotlin) UI layer. The objective is to combine gaming and social tech to build a new kind of social platform on mobile.

To apply, email jobs@high.rs.
